entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.114.0-postgres
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical-cli/v0.36.11...infisical/v0.113.1-postgres

What's Changed

  • feat(secret-sharing): secret requests by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3153
  • Save Secret Reminder from Modal by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3172
  • Documentation: Remove Secret Sync Affix Options Reference by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3171
  • Fix: Address Bitbucket Configuration UI Bug Preventing Workspace Selection by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3169
  • misc: replaced otel auto instrumentation with manual by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3176
  • Add descriptions to secret folders by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3174
  • Add QUIC to gateway by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3178
  • Allow server admins to grant server admin access to other users by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3175
  • feat: quick fix for quic by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3179
  • fix: vercel integration custom envs by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3180
  • Improvement: Clear Secret Scanning Query Params after Setup by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3177
  • feat: fixed cli issues in gateway by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3183
  • feat: added ca to cli by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3187
  • feat: add secret approval review comment by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3184
  • fix: breaking changes check by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3188

New Contributors

  • @carlosmonastyrski made their first contribution in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3172

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.113.0-postgres...infisical/v0.114.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.115.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add actor to secret version history by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3191
  • feat: get secret by ID by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3181
  • fix: address unhandled promise rejects causing 502s by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3202
  • misc: add uncaught exception handler by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3203
  • Feat/add secret name to slack notification by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3195
  • Added webhook trigger for secret reminder by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3199

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.114.0-postgres...infisical/v0.115.0-postgres
